duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares and posts Journal Entries including imported entries and correcting entries.
Prepares monthly encounter and provider incentive reports.
Functions as finance lead to Controller with audit preparation, including financial audit, 403b audit, and workers compensation audit.

education_certification.credential: CPA preferred. Must be knowledgeable in all aspects of advanced accounting. Minimum of three (3) years of relevant experience required. Five (5) years preferred.
